titles.title: Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 5620) to amend title 38, United States Code, to provide for the removal or demotion of employees of the Department of Veterans Affairs based on performance or misconduct, and for other purposes.

Providing for consideration of the bill (H.R. 5620) to amend title 38, United States Code, to provide for the removal or demotion of employees of the Department of Veterans Affairs based on performance or misconduct, and for other purposes.

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 114-742, by Mr. Collins (GA).
The rule makes in order only those amendments printed in the Rules Committee report.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 142.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 859.
On ordering the previous question Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 237 - 170 (Roll no. 498).

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 241 - 169 (Roll no. 499).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: Sets forth the rule for consideration of the bill (H.R. 5620) to amend title 38, United States Code, to provide for the removal or demotion of employees of the Department of Veterans Affairs based on performance or misconduct.
